contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED and the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby REVERSED in accordance with this Court’s opinion in In Re: Appeal of the Borough of Churchill, 525 Pa. 80, 575 A.2d 550 (1990). The case is REMANDED to the Commonwealth Court for consideration of the merits of the appeal from the order of the Blair County Court of Common Pleas. Jurisdiction relinquished.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
